meta.title: Product Details
meta.description: 0.05% Trypsin with EDTA and phenol red; calcium- and magnesium-free. Sterile filtered for gentle, consistent dissociation of tissues and monolayers.

product.name: Trypsin (0.05%) with EDTA & Phenol Red
product.intro: Formulated at 0.05% trypsin and supplemented with EDTA and phenol red. Free of Ca2+ and Mg2+, sterile-filtered, and suitable for gentle dissociation of tissues and adherent cell monolayers.
